mapper.select: select aptCode, apartmentName, lat, lng, sidoName, gugunName, roadName from apart join dongcode d on apart.dongCode = d.dongCode where apart.dongCode=#{dongCode};
select aptCode, apartmentName, lat, lng, sidoName, gugunName, roadName from apart join dongcode d on apart.dongCode = d.dongCode where apart.apartmentName like concat('%', #{subName},'%');
select aptCode, apartmentName, lat, lng, sidoName, gugunName, roadName from apart join dongcode d on apart.dongCode = d.dongCode where aptCode = #{aptCode};
select aptCode, apartmentName, lat, lng, sidoName, gugunName, roadName from apart join dongcode d on apart.dongCode = d.dongCode order by hit desc limit 10;
select * from apartdeal join apart on housedeal.aptCode = houseinfo.aptCode where no=#{dealNo};
